translations: 活泼的土风舞；土风舞会

sentences.sentence: Such a party may be called a hog wrassle, a hoedown, a barndance, or shindig.
sentences.translation: 比如可以叫“小猪摔跤”、“土风舞”、“谷仓舞”或 “狂欢会”。

sentences.sentence: Every year, one of the local Hamptons billionaires got down dirty and threw a big hoedown full of cowboy and caviar.
sentences.translation: 每年，汉普顿本地的一个富翁都会举办一场盛大的挤满牛仔和鱼子酱的土风舞会。
